message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CE, cs.IT. 

The paper proposes a framework for learning policies to guide user activities in closed loop, which involves both machine learning and control theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The paper also involves modeling user activities using point processes, which falls under cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) and cs.IT (Information Theory).
